column5: This is going to be the longest two days in history. Heading out Thursday morning for a trip to Lac Lepage with Marmette outfitters (demi-lune). Absolutely one of the best lakes I have ever fished. Ready for another 1000 walleye week and some 40+ inch pike!! We'll be staying at the outfitters hotel in Maniwaki and hitting clova road Friday morning. Can't wait to drive back that road!!
Our group is headed north this Saturday for the Gouin, Bay Du Nord. Cant wait !!!
